recipe.title: Jícama, Orange, and Coriander Salad
ingredients: 4 navel oranges, peel and pith cut away with a serrated knife and sections cut free from membranes (about 2 cups total), reserving the juice
12 ounces jícama, peeled and cut into 2- by 1/2- by 1/4-inch sticks
1/2 small red onion, sliced thin lengthwise
1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, or to taste
40 pine nuts (2 slightly rounded teaspoons), toasted until golden
instructions: In a large bowl gently stir together all ingredients except pine nuts. Salad may be made up to this point 1 day ahead and covered, chilled.
Sprinkle each serving with 10 pine nuts.
